name: Richard Mann
content: Richard Mann Associate Professor Department of Computer Science University of Waterloo mannr@uwaterloo.ca DC2510 (Davis Center) Voice: (519) 888-4567 x33006 Fax: (519) 885-1208 Driving directions to Waterloo Campus map Announcement: I will be offering CS498/689 (Advanced Topics in CS, Computer Audio) in Winter 2025. This is a project-based course. Choose your own topic. Work individually or in groups. Grade will be 50% homework, 50% project. *** Note, Winter 2025 will be my final offering of this course at University of Waterloo.
